dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 735 RS: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 502 East Cotati Avenue in Cotati, California, as the “Arturo L. Ibleto Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
Reported by Mr. Peters, without amendment

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 502 East Cotati Avenue in Cotati, California, as the Arturo L. Ibleto Post Office Building.

section.header: Arturo L. Ibleto Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 502 East Cotati Avenue in Cotati, California, shall be known and designated as the Arturo L. Ibleto Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Arturo L. Ibleto Post Office Building.
